Title: 🖼 ‼️Community leader Abdullah Akl has been released‼️ After NYPD...
Description: ‼️Community leader Abdullah Akl has been released‼️After NYPD violently arrested him at our emergency protest for Palestine and Lebanon, sent him to the hospital, and held him in custody for nearly 24 hours WOL leader Abdullah Akl has been released.As a result of mounting community pressure, the DA has declined to prosecute the case, demonstrating that the NYPD’s arrest was unjust — making his injuries all the more enraging. Make no mistake, this arrest was a targeted attack on the Palestine movement and the Muslim community of New York.Although our brother has been released, our campaign for justice against the NYPD's months of targeted brutality against our communities as we fight for Palestine has only just begun. We call on all Muslim and Arab community organizations to uplift and share these demands among their networks:1. The resignation of Eric Adams2. The disbandment of the NYPD’s Strategic Response Group3. Shut down NYPD’s office in occupied Palestine

Title: 🖼 ‼️URGENT CALL FOR COURT SUPPORT‼️ We are calling on comrades, ...
Description: ‼️URGENT CALL FOR COURT SUPPORT‼️We are calling on comrades, allies, and our community to come to 100 Centre St in Manhattan, ASAP for our brother and WOL leader Abdullah Akl’s arraignment, and demand his immediate release!Abdullah has been held in NYPD custody for over 18 hours despite being sent to the hospital with serious injuries and denied medication, after last night's violent arrest. We want to welcome him and the other arrestees being currently arraigned, with a sea of support and friendly faces, come out and bring your keffiyehs. 🇵🇸

Title: ↩️🖼 🚨UPDATE: As of 3:30pm, Abdullah is still in state custody a...
Description: WOLPalestine: NYPD brutalizes, arrests, and hospitalizes multiple protestors, including WOL Leader Abdullah Akl. Following months of barbaric brutality from the NYPD, we demand: 1. The resignation of Eric Adams 2. The disbandment of the NYPD’s Strategic Response Group… 🚨UPDATE: As of 3:30pm, Abdullah is still in state custody and is waiting to be arraigned. He was treated at a hospital and transferred to central bookings around 5am. He was with an attorney and family member in the hospital and they have reported he is conscious and alert. An attorney attempted to deliver prescribed medication but was turned away by police and court staff. We expect him to be arraigned later today and will provide updates as we receive them. Abdullah has shown up for his community and his people endlessly, it’s time we show up for him. For now, we ask that friends and comrades post the statement and graphics on the WOL Twitter/X account to expose the NYPDs violence against not only Abdullah, but dozens of other New Yorkers. Folks should also feel encouraged to make their own statements to show wider community support for Abdullah and all New Yorkers of conscience protesting against this genocide. NYPD violence cannot continue to be normalized. #WeStandWithAbdullah

Title: As the United Nations hosts war criminals from around the world i...
Description: As the United Nations hosts war criminals from around the world in NYC, the zionist entity is bombing Gaza and Lebanon with the full backing, diplomatic and military support from the U.S. war machine. Since Monday, the occupation’s indiscriminate bombing of Lebanon has resulted in 550 martyrs and counting, and nearly 2,000 more wounded. On Thursday we take to the streets not only in protest of Butcher Benjamin Netanyahu, but to confront U.S. imperialism, zionism and all those enabling the ongoing genocide in Gaza and the current bloodbath in Lebanon, which includes the UN itself. Meanwhile the NYPD, whose foot soldiers routinely brutalize and murder Black and Brown New Yorkers with impunity and who just days ago shot multiple people on the subway, are responsible for the -security- of the UN General Assembly. The NYPD, embroiled in federal investigations, resignation and scandal, has said that all pedestrian traffic during the UNGA will be shut down east of 2nd Avenue, showing just how afraid they are of losing control with so many eyes on NYC. Join us and action on Thursday Sept. 26th and show the world that street closures won't stop us. Move like water, split into streams and take action throughout the day using the map above. Then join us for a central rally at 6PM at Pershing Square (42nd St. & Park Ave) where we will flood the streets for Gaza, Palestine, Lebanon, Yemen and all our people resisting around the world. Keep an eye on Twitter & Telegram for location updates. 🇵🇸🇱🇧🇾🇪

Title: Some of the top cops overseeing the force and specifically tasked...
Description: Some of the top cops overseeing the force and specifically tasked with repressing the movement for Palestine have a record of brutalizing, abusing, and killing New Yorkers in cold blood, including Chief of Patrol John Chell who murdered Ortanzso Bovell in 2008.This latest police mass shooting comes on the heels of a wide-ranging federal investigation against Adams and the NYPD that has already led to the resignations of several Adams affiliates, including NYPD Commissioner Caban and Adam's top lawyer Lisa Zornberg, and today two former City officials were indicted by federal prosecutors. However, we know Adams and the NYPD's true crimes are not merely corruption and campaign finance violations: they stand guilty for the ongoing murders of Black New Yorkers and their unqualified material support to the zionist genocide of Palestinians.Data on NYPD murders for 2022 + 2023 accessible here: https://mappingpoliceviolence.org/neighborhoods#nationwide. Gothamist reports 12 NYPD killings in 2024 here: https://gothamist.com/news/nypd-shoots-person-in-brooklyn-police-say(3/3)

Title: Our liberation struggles are intertwined and as Palestinians, Ara...
Description: Our liberation struggles are intertwined and as Palestinians, Arabs, and Muslims it is our duty to rise up alongside our Black brothers and sisters against NYPD violence which mirrors the zionist occupation in NYC's Black and brown communities. The NYPD has grown increasingly militarized under the Adams administration both in retaliation against popular movements for Black and Palestinian liberation, and in an escalation of Broken Windows-style policing that never left NYC as well as a surge in stop and frisk incidents which have reached their highest frequency in a decade. From drones, bag checks, cops and military personnel occupying every subway station, we are witnessing an witnessing an increasingly violent police state that has been the daily reality of Black people in this country for hundreds of years. We’ve seen more and more police collaboration with the IDF who has been committing a genocide against our people in Palestine for 76 years, killing at least 200,000 Palestinians since October alone.(2/3)

Title: 🖼 🚨EMERGENCY ACTION: RISE UP FOR BLACK & PALESTINIAN LIBERATION...

Since Eric Adams' became mayor, at least 38 people have been murdered by the NYPD.(1/3)

Title: 🖼 After Easy Aerial executives encouraged Eric Adams to place dr...
Description: After Easy Aerial executives encouraged Eric Adams to place drones on rooftops in -higher crime areas-, NYPD launched a pilot program called -drones as first responders- in which drones have been stationed on rooftops in Black communities throughout Brooklyn and the Bronx. Crye Precision, which manufacturers camouflage for IOF helmets, vests, and packs, also supplies military equipment to the NYPD, including tactical gear worn by the SWAT teams that raided Hind’s Hall last spring.In the wake of two brutal shootings by IOF-trained NYPD this week and 11 months of genocide by the US-funded IOF, the time is NOW to shut down the the corporations in our communities that enable this violence. FROM BROOKLYN TO GAZADISMANTLE FASCIST TECHTake autonomous actions and stay updated on the sustained campaign to shut down genocide profiteers at Brooklyn Navy Yard on Telegram: t.me/demilitarizebrooklynnavyyard(2/2)

Title: 🖼 Join the Noise Demo tomorrow Wednesday 9/18 at 8:00 AM and sha...
Description: Join the Noise Demo tomorrow Wednesday 9/18 at 8:00 AM and share the call to action widely to SHUT DOWN your local weapons manufacturers in Brooklyn. Military technologies including quadcopter drones and tactical gear are manufactured at Brooklyn Navy Yard and then used by the IOF to murder Palestinians. After being tested in Gaza, these technologies are exported around the world and back into NYC to police Black and brown communities.Easy Aerial, which manufacturers quadcopter drones for the IOF, has also played a key role in lobbying the Eric Adams administration to expand the use of drones for policing in New York.(1/2)

Title: 🖼 One poster, published the same year that Oslo was signed, high...

Death to traitors. Our people reject the Oslo Accords-Artist: Mohammed SafiYear: 1993Source: Palestine Poster Project

Title: 🖼 Today, September 13th, marks 31 years since the signing of the...
Description: Today, September 13th, marks 31 years since the signing of the so-called -Oslo Accords- in 1993 and 31 years of the Palestinian people rejecting Oslo and continuing to resist the illegitimate, genocidal zionist entity by any means necessary. The negotiations, which were brokered by the US, resulted in the PLO recognizing -israel- and denouncing armed struggle. At the time of the signing the late Palestinian intellectual Edward Said declared, -Let us call the agreement by its real name: an instrument of Palestinian surrender.- But surrender the Palestinian masses did not.From the ongoing holocaust in Gaza to the largest invasion and assault on the West Bank since 2002, the Palestinian people continue to resist and resist and resist. From our prisoners to our martyrs, from our freedom fighters to our intellectuals, from Zakaria Zubeidi to Ibrahim Al-Nabulsi, from Khader Adnan to Basil Al-Araj, from Nizar Banat to Abu Shujaa, one generation after the next have declared time and time again: -No surrender!

Title: 🖼 THURSDAY (9/12) is National SJP's DAY OF ACTION‼️🇵🇸 The down...
Description: THURSDAY (9/12) is National SJP's DAY OF ACTION‼️🇵🇸The downtown NYC schools will be collaborating to highlight the citywide struggle to fight for Palestinian freedom.The school-wide rally will begin at the Fashion Institute of Technology on 27th Street and 8th Ave at 12pm.Throughout the day, students will rally between SVA, NYU, and finally, TNSBring friends, family, noisemakers, masks, and keffiyehs to show your support!

Title: 🖼 53 years ago Sept 9th 1971 the Attica Uprising began when over...
Description: 53 years ago Sept 9th 1971 the Attica Uprising began when over 1,200 men incarcerated in upstate NY rose up and took control of the prison to demand basic human rights & dignity. Today the struggle to #ShutDownAttica and free all political prisoners from the US to 🇵🇸continues.Sparked by the murder of George Jackson in San Quentin prison in California weeks prior, the Attica rebellion lasted for four days. On Sept 13th under the orders of the Governor of NY, state police stormed the prison and carried out a premeditated bloodbath, massacring 39 people. In 2021, just three days before the 50th anniversary of the Attica Uprising, six Palestinian prisoners carried out the heroic freedom tunnel escape from -Gilboa- prison. From Attica to Gilboa, from 1971 to 2021 to the present, prisoners revolt by any means necessary!

Title: For 76 years, from 1948 to September 6th to October 7th, in the f...
Description: For 76 years, from 1948 to September 6th to October 7th, in the face of ethnic cleansing and genocide, torture and rape, siege and blockade, death and destruction, slaughter and annihilation, the Palestinian people have resisted, and resisted and resisted by any means necessary. Assata Shakur once wrote that -A wall is just a wall and nothing more at all. It can be broken down.- With every freedom tunnel dug, every wall broken down, every concentration camp and open-air prison liberated, we are brought closer to Palestinian liberation. During the occupation’s latest invasion of the West Bank, the largest since 2002, nearly 40 Palestinians have been martyred, many of them while taking up arms in defense of the camps.Just days ago Zakaria Al-Zubeidi’s son Mohammed was martyred when he and four other freedom fighters were targeted in a drone strike by IOF in Tubas. Following in his father’s path, Mohammed rose in defense of the land, like Abu Shujaa, Ibrahim Al-Nabulsi and thousands like them. From Gaza to Jenin, Tulkarem to Nablus, Tubas to Al-Khalil, Al-Quds to the occupied interior, Palestine resists as one nation, one people, one struggle. Until liberation Within Our Lifetime.🇵🇸(2/2)

Title: 🖼 September 6th 2021 — With spoons, our heroes Zakaria Al-Zubeid...
Description: September 6th 2021 — With spoons, our heroes Zakaria Al-Zubeidi, Mahmoud Al-Arda, Mohammed Al-Arda, Yaqoub Qadri, Ayham Kamamji and Munadil Nafiyat dug their way to freedom and escaped from the occupation’s maximum security -Gilboa- prison three years ago today.-We wanted to tell the world that this monster is an illusion of dust,- Mahmoud Al-Arda later declared.(1/2)

Title: DAG is also funding an ambulance and providing medical equipment ...
Description: DAG is also funding an ambulance and providing medical equipment to Kusra, Umm El Khair, and Masafar Yatta—rural Palestinian communities under constant threat from settler attacks. Donate to support critical health care in Palestine. Your donation will directly:1. Strengthen services and equip Al-Awda Maternal Hospital.2. Fund an ambulance for rural communities facing daily settler violence.3. Title: 🖼 🚨🇵🇸 PALESTINE FUNDRAISER 🗓️ Labor Day 09.02.24 🕛 5-9 PM �...
Description: 🚨🇵🇸 PALESTINE FUNDRAISER🗓️ Labor Day 09.02.24🕛 5-9 PM📍 West Village (NYC)🩺 After the National March For Gaza, join us to support critical medical relief efforts in Palestine with Doctors Against Genocide and Healthcare Workers for Palestine🎟️ tinyurl.com/LDNYCRSVPDonate: http://donorbox.org/9-2-nyc-fundraiser-for-gazaDoctors Against Genocide is on the ground in Palestine, enhancing services and supplying essential equipment to Al-Awda Maternal Hospital in Gaza. Donate to our fundraiser to support their work and share widely!(1/2)

Title: 🖼 In the early hours of August 28th the zionist entity launched ...
Description: In the early hours of August 28th the zionist entity launched its largest invasion in the West Bank since 2002, targeting Jenin, Tulkarem, Tubas, Nablus and more in a desperate attempt to claim a -victory- after 11 months of failure and humiliation in its ongoing war on Gaza. In the early hours of August 28th the zionist entity launched its largest invasion in the West Bank since 2002, targeting Jenin, Tulkarem, Tubas, Nablus and more in a desperate attempt to claim a -victory- after 11 months of failure and humiliation in its ongoing war on Gaza.-Our regards to all youth and fighters in the West Bank, Gaza Strip, and in the diaspora. God willing, we will not let you down.-And Abu Shujaa has certainly not let us down, even in his martyrdom there is victory as he never backed down, keeping the resistance in the West Bank alive, with thousands carrying the same will as Abu Shujaa: to rise and resist until Palestine is free within our lifetime.🇵🇸

Title: 🖼 🚨 EVENTBRITE IS COMPLICIT IN PALESTINIAN REPRESSION🚨 The eve...
Description: 🚨 EVENTBRITE IS COMPLICIT IN PALESTINIAN REPRESSION🚨The event page for a planned fundraiser following our Labor Day march against genocide and Palestinian repression was REMOVED by Eventbrite tonight. Tickets can currently be purchased here: tinyurl.com/LDNYCRSVPEventbrite seems to think that a fundraiser event for medical supplies and care in Gaza -could contribute to a risk of harm or incite violence.- But we see this transparent act of repression for what it is: yet another attempt at subverting Palestinian organizing efforts.Join us in demanding the IMMEDIATE REINSTATEMENT of our event page as well as an immediate explanation from Eventbrite.
